item.title: Heathen AKA (prev. AKA SND) - Can't Go Back [Electronic, IDM]
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Thanks

darwinmcd:

Any plans to release a “You Don’t Know” single including that awesome “darwinmcd remix”?

For sure. Though it will be finished up as a vocal track, when I get round to finding the right lyricist/vocalist.

It’ll be released under a different name though. Not sure this sound and the Synth-pop sound would work well under a single artist name.

I have three names that I could/want to use. I’m in the process of figuring out which tracks should go with which name.

If I do get close to finishing up You Don’t Know, I’ll be sure to give you a heads up as well as the vocal stems. It will allow you to add vocals/vocal chops to your remix, if you wanted.

Read full topic

item.title: Heathen AKA (prev. AKA SND) - Can't Go Back [Electronic, IDM]
item.dc:creator: darwinmcd
item.description:
Awesome tracks dude!! Glad to see you made the leap to Spotify/iTunes/etc (welcome to the club ). Followed you on your Spotify artist page. Liking the new artist name too.

Any plans to release a “You Don’t Know” single including that awesome “darwinmcd remix”?

Congrats bud!
